name: save_context
description: Save conversation context to Wolkvox system before transferring the call. This ensures the human agent has full context of what was discussed with the bot.

issue_type.description: Type of issue: AUTO_ACCIDENT for car accidents, HOME_DAMAGE for home/property issues, GENERAL_INQUIRY for other inquiries

summary.description: Brief summary of the conversation including key details like: what happened, when it happened, severity, if emergency services were called, etc.
